author: markt
msg: Allow database realms configured with an all roles mode that is authentication only to not have to define a role table

author: kkolinko
msg: Remove unneeded handling of FORM auth in RealmBase.
The login and error pages are handled via forward, so processing completes before this code is ever reached.
The action page is handled elsewhere.

author: markt
msg: Fix race condition between the processing of session sync message and transfer complete message.
